thread.title: How Slate responded to Moonlight’s shocking Best Picture win.
thread.title_full: How Slate responded to Moonlight’s shocking Best Picture win.

author: Slate Staff
title: How Slate responded to Moonlight’s shocking Best Picture win.
text:
Feb. 27 2017 12:39 AM How Slate Responded to Moonlight ’s Shocking Best Picture Win Actors Faye Dunaway and Warren Beatty speak onstage during the 89th Annual Academy Awards at Hollywood & Highland Center on February 26, 2017 in Hollywood, California. Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images 
At 12:10 a.m. ET, the Slate culture team was engaged in a lukewarm Slack conversation about La La Land ’s Best Picture victory. At 12:11 a.m. ET, the tone of that conversation changed. 
Willa Paskin [12:11 AM]: wait what Advertisement 
Jeffrey Bloomer [12:11 AM]: What 
Marissa Martinelli [12:11 AM]: What is happening 
David Canfield [12:11 AM]: what 
Matthew Dessem [12:11 AM]: Are you kidding me? Advertisement 
Heather Schwedel [12:11 AM]: WHA 
Dan Kois [12:11 AM]: uh wh t 
Willa Paskin [12:11 AM]: holy shit 
Dan Kois [12:11 AM]: what Advertisement 
Dan Kois [12:11 AM]: what 
Jeffrey Bloomer [12:11 AM]: Holy shit 
Dan Kois [12:11 AM]: what 
Dan Kois [12:11 AM]: what Advertisement 
Matthew Dessem [12:11 AM]: Wow 
Jeffrey Bloomer [12:11 AM]: omg 
Forrest Wickman [12:11 AM]: WHAT 
Marissa Martinelli [12:11 AM]: Has this ever happened Advertisement 
Marissa Martinelli [12:11 AM]: Ever 
Aisha Harris [12:11 AM]: WAIT 
Aisha Harris [12:11 AM]: WTF

Jacob Brogan [12:11 AM]: Wtf
